tool_description: The GitHub API Scrapper is a great way to access GitHub repos
name: GitHub API Scrapper
title: GitHub API Scrapper

api_list.name: Get Top 30 GitHub Repo Results
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://github-api-scrapper.p.rapidapi.com/search_top30/rails"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "github-api-scrapper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://github-api-scrapper.p.rapidapi.com/search_top30/{query}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "github-api-scrapper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
